Carlos has held development and senior management roles at hosting and technology businesses for more than a decade. As Chief Visionary Officer he is responsible for OnApp product and company vision and direction. He has huge web hosting automation experience, and was architect of H-Sphere as well as OnAppâ€™s cloud software. Carlos was previously MD of Positive Software (US), CEO of Relio and DataColo, and COO at Comodo. He also has a background in design, animation and media.

What else? Carlos is Portugese, worked in the US for more than 12 years, and currently lives in the UK. He is fanatical about good design - particularly in technology, graphics and the user experience - as well as food, family and business innovation.
